name: @promster/metrics
description: Metrics utilities used by all other server integrations

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -i modules/index.js -o dist/@promster-metrics.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -i modules/index.js -o dist/@promster-metrics.cjs.js

author: Tobias Deekens <nerd@tdeekens.name>
